Reviews.Title: Not too bad of a cheap TV
Reviews.Author: frenchiefellow
Reviews.Content: I got this for Christmas in 2008 (i think). Have had SD signal programming coming through since I got it, and it sounds and looks fine. I have my Xbox 360 plugged in running at 720P, doesn't look too bad, not fantastic, but not bad HD.Only problem is that it seems that the pixels are slowly dying away, only a few a year, but its not noticeable from a distance.Other than that its a pretty standard TV, nothing fantastic, but it gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: Good little TV!
Reviews.Author: Adam McGuire
Reviews.Content: The Emerson TV has a nice, small screen that is good for gaming and using as a computer monitor with the VGA port. Unfortunately it does not have an HDMI input, so there are some things which will not work with it, and any computer which might have HDMI and not VGA will not be able to use it.

ProductInfo.Features:
1440 X 900 Pixel Resolution
3D Digital Comb Filter
Inputs: 1 Component, 1 AV, 1 VGA, 1 S-Video
Dimensions On Stand (WHD) 18.7" X 15." X 7.5" In.
ProductInfo.Name: Emerson LC195EM9 LC195EM9 19 720p LCD TV
